attributes.additional_details: You should open the barbers on 5 March so we don’t get distracted with our hair during class which could ruin our education which would ruin the next generation gcse grades
attributes.background: Open the barbers on 5 March so all the people with over grown hair can get haircuts

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408
